extracted_entities.name: ERCIM STM WG 2025 Award for the Best Ph.D. Thesis on Security and Trust Management

main_conferences: 21st International Workshop on Security and Trust Management (STM 2025)

submission_information: Applications consisting of the Ph.D. Thesis (in PDF format), a short summary of the Thesis (mandatory in English), a curriculum vitae (in PDF format), and letters of support from at least two researchers, one of whom should be from an ERCIM STM WG Institution.
